title: Fish (item)
summaries: The Fish is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Baby Penguin to follow the player around. When the player is flying or far enough away, the Baby Penguin will simply fly towards the player on the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, but flies using a jetpack instead on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile version. The Fish has a 1/50 (2%) chance of being obtained from Frozen Chests and a 1/20 (5%) chance of being dropped from Frozen(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) and Boreal Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions).

statistics.Sell: 2 GC
